name: Earth Defense: Zeff's Invasion
description:
It's an single player arcade shooting game! The Zeffs are robots invading Earth! Can you be the hero using the turret to stop them from coming? You can pick power-ups that randomly appear to help you defend the city! Those pesky robots can even drop weapons that will help you fight them! 

You only NEED  your mouse to point and shoot!

This is meant to be a mobile shooting game therefore the resolutions.  After all,  having fun shooting robots is very nice :) 

Beat your friends with the highest score!! 

All you need to play is:

  • A mouse

Currently the game has infinity mode only, where the robots will keep spawning until you get tired. Levels are going to be added in future updates.

Support The Game

Our game is under active development, please leave a review to support it or leave us some feedback!
